attributes.review: Im extremely upset with this app. After take 2 hours to download, the app kept opening and closing. It also had no translations to spanish, never again. Tried to download this for my grandma and she can’t read in English. I’m extremely upset. You lost my vote trump and my Abula’s.
attributes.title: Horrific

attributes.review: If I could give this a 0 star I would you are taking down tictok for no reason and a lot of people on that app had depression and they went on TikTok and they got over there depression and a lot of people have over 10 millions of followers on that app please do not take TikTok down man
attributes.title: Don’t take TikTok away

attributes.review: This app is so bad it made my phone glitch and put a virus in my PHONE I had to get a new one and I’m about to delete it. This is crazy I had to pay almost 500 dollars just because of ONE APP I suggest that no one uses this app and rate it one star because this is just ridiculous.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: After finding out about trumps death I really couldn’t bare having this app. I loved him SOOOOOOOOO much! He always reminded me of my favorite snack. A Cheeto. And everyday I am just reminded that my BEAUTIFUL ORANGE PRESIDENT is not on this earth anymore. This app made me sad and it will make you sad to. But anyways I’m getting McDonalds so does anyone want anything?
attributes.title: I can’t believe this app!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible it’s not helpful I threw up and I was sick for days do not download this app because it made my phone glitchy and it wasn’t working and it also made my phone crack. Everyone don’t get this app is so bad and no one want see a cow face so I recommend do not download this app please👏🏽👏🏽!
attributes.title: NO❤️

attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER! my aunt was a huge supporter and i mean t shirts and hats and posters. one day she bought a cardboard cut out of him and would sleep with it every night. this made my uncle sad and then he died. but that’s not the death im talking about. the app started glitching and flashing and then it gave my aunt a seizure. now we spread her ashes in living memory
attributes.title: gen z will win :)))

attributes.review: He used this app to track my whole family and he got them all murdered, I cannot believe a person who is supposed to protect us killed my family. I am literally the last family member to survive, please make sure he is not our president again.
attributes.title: Anyone but Trump

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about our President and try to see if I could tap that, but then the app made my phone explode!!!! I tried to get my cats to eat it to help me clean up and it killed them!!!! The trump app killed my cats!!! I am absolutely furious and I wish I could give this app 0 stars 😒😤😳
attributes.title: The app killed my cats

attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus ! it’s awful now I can’t open any app without it loading for 1-10 minutes even. the app itself is quite slow and barely even works. Now I have to go to the Apple store to get my phone fixed ! ugh.
attributes.title: AWFUL sooo many issues 😾

attributes.review: 🍊I am unable to comprehend why you Orange praising fools   🍊👄🍊 think this is a good app. This horrible terrifying looking 🍊 popped up on my screen when I first opened the app🍊✨💕.  It was this orange with eyes 👀 🍊 staring at me, it scared my mom, who was watching me on my phone.✨ when she say the orange faced demon, 🍊👄🍊she fell over and cracked her head on the floor. This app is unacceptable.💕✨🍊
attributes.title: 🍊✨💕 Cheeto
